channel.title: How do I get my Server Online?
channel.description:
I've finished everything, now I just want to put it onto the Server Status Page.
The thing is, to get it on there it says that the server has to be online..
So what do I do to make it online? Do I have to code anything specific so that I log onto my server name instead of "127.0.0.1"?
Help would be appreciated. :)
Thanks, Aleksander.

item.title: How do I get my Server Online?
item.dc:creator: @Aleksander Aleksander
item.description:
@Aleksander wrote:

Yea, I signed up and made a No-Ip a long time ago, along with Port forwarding.

Just wasn’t too sure on how to get other people on it.

Thanks guys.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get my Server Online?

item.title: How do I get my Server Online?
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

127.0.0.1 is the ‘localhost’ IP

Only you will be able to connect to the source with 127.0.0.1 set.

You will need to register a No-IP.duc, and uTorrent (if you are going to be portforwarding)

Or buy a VPS, or Dedicated Server of some kind.

~I hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I get my Server Online?

item.title: How do I get my Server Online?
item.dc:creator: @Aeolian Aeolian.
item.description:
@Aeolian wrote:

You, made your No-Ip,

;So Now Go Here, and check if your server is online or not,

if it isint; then you did something wrong while makeing your server;

Rune locus .com/?action=statuscheck

Erase the Spaces

Read full topic
